name: Voice
message: That's awfully kind of you, Jonathan Swift.

name: Voice
message: Fine then, go ahead and watch.

name: Voice
message: Wondering just what exactly you really are...

name: Male voice
message: Look at these pitiful women's faces... With nothing they can do against the damnable ones violating them, they just have to accept the moment filthy seed gets poured into them.
A man is speaking to someone in a tense voice. I can't see him. The room is crude and filthy, surrounded by stone on all sides. ...Feels like a prison, but...？

The fact that this place is completely unfamiliar to me—could this be a dream? But it all feels too real. I can hear sobs from women, sounding like agony or ecstasy, and the smell of female sex and burning animal fat clings to my nose and won't go away.
Two women are getting violated, toyed with by shadowy, shapeless things. I've never seen their faces before, but I know exactly who they are.

name: Angelica
message: Uh... Please, I beg you...
Why must you do this to me?！

name: Male voice
message: Why, you ask？ That's insulting. You are chosen priestesses.
Offer yourself and your body to me and my god, and become the sacrifice of our covenant.

name: Lushion
message: Ah, I don't care about your god！
Even if you kill me, I won't let things go your way.

name: Male voice
message: Let's see how long you can keep up that act...
Once tonight is over, you'll be the sacrifice too.
Whether you like it or not, you don't get to choose.

name: Angelica
message: I have always served you,
with all my heart！
And yet... even so...

name: Male voice
message: That means you're useless now.
The time has come... The moment of awakening is near.

name: Angelica
message: Ah, please, I beg you！

name: Male voice
message: It's too late. Don't you get it？
What's happening inside your own womb.

name: Angelica
message: No！
Such a horrible thing... inside me！

name: Lushion
message: Nn...h... D-Do you really think something like this... will make me submit？ ...Pathetic... how pathetic...
Torment　the　abominable　ones　even　more...　more！

name: Lushion
message: Ahh...！

name: Male voice
message: The pathetic one is you.

The woman has every bodily orifice penetrated, her face twisted in agony, unable even to raise her voice. The shadow tormenting her, with a strength that seems to know no fatigue, keeps ruthlessly and mechanically violating her, with no end in sight.

Her white skin was stained with filthy fluids, and streaks of blood ran all over her body. Sweat beaded on her body flushed from the intense action, mixing with the marks of tears she'd shed and dripping onto the stone floor.

name: Male voice
message: You are... foolish and pathetic.
Even though you let in those accursed bastards.
Clinging to an empty will...

name: Lushion
message: No way... That's not true！
There was no strength behind those words of denial.
While being devoured by the hideous shadow, the woman's body, trembling with delight and making no attempt to escape, almost looks as though she's enjoying even the words of abuse.

name: Lushion
message: Ah...... please, Sarah.
Hurry　and　run......　if　it's　now,　you　can　still......

name: Male voice
message: You can't escape.
I need it for my plan.

name: Lushion
message: Lord... please protect that girl！

name: Male voice
message: つまらぬ虚栄は捨てて、己の姿をよく見てみるがいい。
Look at us, drowning in pleasure！
The face of the other woman had clearly accepted everything, surrendering her body to the shadow. Her expression, completely immersed in ecstasy and pleasure, no longer showed any sign of pain.
Even if the restraints fixing both hands were removed, she probably wouldn't resist anymore. No, she'd probably wrap her arms around Shadow's back herself, trying to find deeper satisfaction.

name: Male voice
message: You'll be just like that soon enough.
You might as well enjoy it while you can, because this is just the price you pay for the suffering that's waiting for you later.

name: Male voice
message: A suffering even worse than death, huh.
There's　no　turning　back　now,　absolutely　not.

On the woman's face, the turmoil of her inner conflict was plain to see. Should she just surrender both body and soul, letting herself be swallowed up by the surging whirlpool of sensuality? But her morals, pride, and faith wouldn't allow it.

name: Voice
message: ...Jonathan Swift...
‥‥‥Jonathan Swift‥‥‥
...Don't you remember...? Aren't you awake yet...?
I didn't understand. Who am I, and why am I in this situation? Why don't I even find that strange?

Why is it that, even though the women are going through such terrible things, I don't even try to go help them? Like a frightened kid, I'm just staring dumbfounded at the tragedy unfolding right in front of me.

name: Voice
message: ...Jonathan Swift...You still don't get it...
The one seeing this isn't your eyes.
It's not your ears that are hearing this.
Suddenly, I realized. My consciousness is merely reliving events that happened in another place, at another time, through someone else's five senses.
And that someone is.........
